name: kosmickop
description:
In a post apocalyptic wasteland, a jerboa is impersonating a police officer, much to the chagrin of a shadowy fascist organisation.

Gameplay

  • Explore and battle in the remains of the solar system squashed into a small flat plane by unknown forces
  • Featuring a stackable temporary powerup system that ensures you will always be scavenging for an advantage
  • Trifle with the eccentric survivors of the solar system.
  • The dwellers have their own factions and have constant skirmishes between themselves.
  • The more properties a faction owns the better their units will be. Mess with their economy by destroying buildings or favour one faction for your own amusement
  • Learn about the mysteries of Kosmickopolis by collecting lore
  • Rummage for power ups in the surreal landscape in free play mode
  • Protect the inhabitants from a sudden odious imposing force through the numerous missions of the game
  • Fight numerous boss battles

Steam Features

  • Steam Achievements for additional replayability
  • Steam Leaderboards for most damage caused in a day
  • Steam Cloud for saved games
